function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Rapid spread of COVID-19 due to unrestricted mobility and travel","Impact":"Increased transmission of SARS-CoV-2 to locations outside of Wuhan","Mitigation":"Implementing travel restrictions and cordon sanitaires to delay and reduce spread","Technologies":"Real-time mobility data, surveillance systems, and crowdsource line lists","People":"Residents of affected areas, travelers, and healthcare workers","Owner":"Government authorities, public health agencies, and transportation authorities"}]}
